name: Time Shaker
description:
One-part Aladdin, two-parts Groundhog Day, Time Shaker is a mini-visual novel about the dreaded process of getting a job. With the help of a time-looping genie, you will talk, fight, or escape through the bustling city to reach the office building in time for your interview. And you'll keep trying over and over and over again until you get that job that you so desperately need. With multiple choices and paths, every loop of your day can be a different experience.

A visual novel created in a month for NaNoRenO 2021 with a group of 6 people.
